short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple and quick way to check word and kanji frequencies on the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Scrapes HTML body text and parses the Japanese on the fly. Great for quick overviews of the frequency of words or kanji within Japanese websites.
